Body: If the screen resolution is high enough, there should be no difference between a tablet and an e-ink ebook reader (I read in several reviews). However, when I use my Android table (2560x1600) for reading by Adobe Acrobat, my eyes get tired soon comparing with Amazon Kindle.I tried several bluelight filter, but it makes the color unnatural.What are the best apps/ways to use an Android table for reading colorful PDF documents for long time without eye strain?
Title: How to use Android tablet as a ebook reader?
